form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title of the image, Screened by NARA, 7/24023, Form number only in double quotes separately

full_text: (Page Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 22. (Complete this block only if you checked box A or D of block 1) a. I have a priority on the consular waiting list at the American Consulate at as of (City) (Date) XXX b. A visa petition according me preference status was approved by the district director at MIAMI, FLORIDA on 8-19-1975 (City and State) (Date) c. A visa petition has not been approved in my behalf but I claim eligibility for preference status because my spouse my parent is the beneficiary of a visa petition approved by the district director at (City and State) on (Date) d. I am claiming preference status as a refugee under the proviso to Section 203 (a)(7) of the Act who has been continuously physically present in the United States for at least the past two years. (If you check this item, you must execute and attach Form I-590A to this application.) e. S.) 24. Completed Form G-325A (Biographic Information) is Completed Form G-325A (Biographic Information) is not attached as part of this application. attached as applicant is under 14 years of age. 25. IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS, Signature of Applicant: WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET BELOW: 7 Ohung Ching heing Date of Signature: March 14, 1975 26. (Signature of person preparing form, if other than applicant.) I declare that Address of person preparing form, if other than applicant this document was prepared by me at the request of the applicant and is based on all information on which I have any knowledge. 1200 Wilshire, Suite 300 Los Angeles, Calif. 90017 WELLINGTON KWAN Date: 3/14/75 Occupation: Attorney at Law (Applical not to be signed below until applicant appears before an officer of the Immigration and Naturalization Service for examination) I, CHENG CHING-HSING , do swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this application subscribed by me including the attached documents, that the same are true to the best of my knowledge, and that corrections numbered ( ) to ( ) were made by me or at my request, and that this application was signed by me with my full, true name: Oheng (Complete and true Ching-hong signature of applicant) FFR 28 1977 Subscribed and sworn to before me by the above-named applicant at (Month) (Day) (Year) Cstun 23 (Signature and title of officer) (Page 3)
